channel.title: industry on Tokyo, endless city
channel.description: Recent content in industry on Tokyo, endless city

item.title: Industry and Smokestacks
item.description: It is easy to forget that Tokyo has industial areas when you stay within the approximate confines of the Yamanote line. But just an hour south east of Tokyo central are scenes like these in Ukishimacho in Kawasaki ward. In this case visible from my flight into Haneda airport.
